duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and perform experiments including target validation and assay development in solid tumors for advancement of programs and new targets.
Independently perform assigned experiments, interpret complex data, rework experiments based on interpretations, and propose next steps.
Teach others tasks and techniques, correct issues, and provide unsolicited ideas to the team.
Prepare clear and concise summaries of data and present to the project team and senior colleagues.
Work in a collaborative environment, be organized, demonstrate urgency, and be sensitive to timelines.

Show proficiency in multiple cell biology assays including but not limited to Western blotting, flow cytometry, ELISAs, cell proliferation, cellular cytotoxicity, immune cell isolation, protein electrophoresis, transfection, and immunoprecipitation.

education_certification.credential: M.S. with 3-6 years of experience or a B.S./B.A. with 4-12 years of experience, performing progressively advanced duties. Strong cell biology and assay development skills required. Background in cancer biology and biotech/pharma experience preferred.
